atk-s0403a40:2_1: Dutiyassa tatiye nālanti na yuttaṁ nānucchavikaṁ.
atk-s0403a40:2_2: Na manāpenāti na manamhi appanakena ākārena nisinnāsanato paccuṭṭhenti,
atk-s0403a40:2_4: Santamassa pariguhantīti vijjamānampi deyyadhammaṁ etassa niguhanti paṭicchādenti.
atk-s0403a40:2_5: Asakkaccaṁ denti no sakkaccanti lūkhaṁ vā hotu paṇītaṁ vā,
atk-s0403a40:4_4: So catunnaṁ arūpasamāpattīnaṁ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṁ pattānaṁ catunnaṁ,
atk-s0403a40:4_5: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya arahattaṁ pattaanāgāmino ca vasena pañcavidho hoti.
atk-s0403a40:4_7: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
atk-s0403a40:4_8: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī’’ti (pu. pa.
atk-s0403a40:5_2: catūhi jhānehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṁ pattā cattāro cāti imesaṁ vasena pañcavidho hoti.
atk-s0403a40:5_4: ‘‘na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
atk-s0403a40:5_5: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
atk-s0403a40:6_3: So sotāpattiphalaṭṭhaṁ ādiṁ katvā yāva arahattamaggaṭṭhā chabbidho hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0403a40:6_4: ‘‘idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
atk-s0403a40:6_5: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
atk-s0403a40:7_3: sukho nirodhoti ñātaṁ hoti diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phusitaṁ paññāyāti diṭṭhippatto.
atk-s0403a40:7_4: Vitthārato pana sopi kāyasakkhī viya chabbidho hoti.
atk-s0403a40:7_8: tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā paññāya…pe…
atk-s0403a40:8_4: tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā paññāya…pe…
atk-s0403a40:8_7: Etassa hi saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe saddahantassa viya okappentassa viya adhimuccantassa viya ca kilesakkhayo hoti,
atk-s0403a40:8_8: diṭṭhippattassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṁ adandhaṁ tikhiṇaṁ sūraṁ hutvā vahati.
atk-s0403a40:8_9: Tasmā yathā nāma nātitikhiṇena asinā kadaliṁ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṁ maṭṭhaṁ na hoti,
atk-s0403a40:8_14: Yathā pana sunisitena asinā kadaliṁ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṁ maṭṭhaṁ hoti,
atk-s0403a40:9_6: ‘‘yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa paññindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti,
atk-s0403a40:9_9: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti,
atk-s0403a40:11_1: Pañcame udakūpamāti nimujjanādiākāraṁ gahetvā udakena upamitā.
atk-s0403a40:11_7: Ummujjitvā vipassati viloketīti uṭṭhahitvā gantabbadisaṁ vipassati viloketi.
atk-s0403a40:11_9: Paṭigādhappatto hotīti uṭṭhāya viloketvā pataritvā ekasmiṁ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpatto nāma hoti,
atk-s0403a40:11_11: Tiṇṇopāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhatīti sabbakilesoghaṁ taritvā paratīraṁ gantvā nibbānathale patiṭṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-s0403a40:13_1: Chaṭṭhe aniccāti evaṁ paññāya pharanto anupassatīti aniccānupassī.
atk-s0403a40:13_3: Aniccāti evaṁ ñāṇena paṭisaṁveditā assāti aniccapaṭisaṁvedī.
atk-s0403a40:13_5: Samitanti yathā purimacittena pacchimacittaṁ samitaṁ samupagataṁ ghaṭṭitaṁ hoti, evaṁ.
atk-s0403a40:14_6: Tattha yassa aññatarena rogena phuṭṭhassa sato rogavūpasamo ca āsavakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva hoti,
atk-s0403a40:14_8: Yassa pana aññataraṁ vedanaṁ vedayato vedanāvūpasamo ca āsavakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva hoti,
atk-s0403a40:14_10: Yassa pana ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu aññatarasamaṅgino vipassantassa iriyāpathassa pariyosānañca āsavakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva hoti,
atk-s0403a40:14_12: Yassa pana upakkamato vā sarasato vā jīvitapariyādānañca āsavakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva hoti,
atk-s0403a40:14_16: jīvitapariyādānaṁ cuticittena hotīti ubhinnaṁ ekakkhaṇe sambhavo nāma natthi.
atk-s0403a40:14_17: Yasmā panassa āsavesu khīṇamattesu paccavekkhaṇavārānantarameva jīvitapariyādānaṁ gacchati,
atk-s0403a40:15_0: Antarāparinibbāyīti yo pañcasu suddhāvāsesu yattha katthaci uppanno nibbattakkhaṇe vā thokaṁ atikkamitvā vā vemajjhe ṭhatvā vā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0403a40:15_2: Upahaccaparinibbāyīti yo tattheva āyuvemajjhaṁ atikkamitvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0403a40:15_3: Asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti yo tesaṁyeva puggalānaṁ asaṅkhāreneva appayogena kilese khepeti.
atk-s0403a40:15_4: Sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti yo sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese khepeti.
atk-s0403a40:15_5: Uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti yo heṭṭhā catūsu suddhāvāsesu yattha katthaci nibbattitvā tato cuto anupubbena akaniṭṭhe uppajjitvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0403a40:17_3: Navame sukhānupassīti sukhanti evaṁ ñāṇena anupassanto.
atk-s0403a40:19_6: Titthiyā hi dasavassakāle mataṁ nigaṇṭhaṁ niddasoti vadanti.
atk-s0403a40:19_7: So kira puna dasavasso na hoti.
atk-s0403a40:19_10: Eteneva nayena vīsativassādikālepi mataṁ nigaṇṭhaṁ ‘‘nibbīso nittiṁso niccattālīso nippaññāso’’ti vadanti.
atk-s0403a40:19_11: Āyasmā ānando gāme vicaranto taṁ kathaṁ sutvā vihāraṁ gantvā bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0403a40:19_16: Khīṇāsavo hi dasavassakāle parinibbuto puna dasavasso na hoti.
atk-s0403a40:19_25: Iti bhagavā ‘‘mama sāsane khīṇāsavassetaṁ adhivacana’’nti vatvā yehi kāraṇehi niddaso hoti,
atk-s0403a40:20_1: Sikkhāsamādāne tibbacchando hotīti sikkhāttayapūraṇe balavacchando hoti.
atk-s0403a40:20_2: Āyatiñca sikkhāsamādāne avigatapemoti anāgate punadivasādīsupi sikkhāpūraṇe avigatapemeneva samannāgato hoti.
